Sebuah Catatan di Pesawat Sempat Ganggu Operasional Bandara
07 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Foto: Ilustrasi American Airlines (CNN)

Atlanta - Sebuah catatan ditemukan di dalam pesawat yang hendak lepas landas. Karena catatan itu dianggap bernuansa ancaman, imbasnya tak cuma ke pesawat itu tapi juga mengganggu operasional bandara selama beberapa jam.Dikumpulkan dari berbagai sumber oleh detikcom, catatan itu ditemukan di atas pesawat American Airlines yang akan berangkat dari Bandara Internasional Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta, Georgia menuju DFW Internasional Airport, Texas.Menurut WRCBTV.com, catatan itu ditemukan dalam pesawat sekitar pukul 7.00 waktu setempat. Akibatnya, pesawat urung bersiap lepas landas dan penumpang pun diminta turun lebih dulu dari badan pesawat untuk dilakukan pengecekan ulang di gate.Selain itu, disebutkan pula bahwa catatan ancaman yang ditemukan dalam pesawat tersebut turut membuat FAA menyetop penerbangan yang akan mendarat di bandara Hartsfield-Jackson sebagai usaha mengantisipasi.Fox23.com menambahkan, Carlos Campos selaku juru bicara kepolisian Atlanta mengatakan bahwa pihaknya juga langsung melakukan pemeriksaan menyeluruh di pesawat terhadap adanya potensi yang mengancam keselamatan dan keamanan.Setelah penyelidikan, tidak ditemukan indikasi bahwa catatan ancaman tersebut sebagai sesuatu yang kredibel. Pada akhirnya pesawat American Airlines Flight 2770 pun diberikan izin lepas landas, dengan operasional bandara baru bisa berjalan normal lagi sekitar pukul 11 pagi waktu setempat.Simak Video "Lirik Wanita Lain di Pesawat, Pria Ini Dihantam Laptop Pacarnya"[Gambas:Video 20detik](elk/krs)

A Note on Plane Had to Interrupt Airport Operations
Nov 7 2019, 09:47 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Photo: Illustration of American Airlines (CNN)

Atlanta - A note was found on the plane that was about to take off. Because the note was considered a threat nuance, the impact was not only on the plane but also disrupted airport operations for several hours. Collected from various sources by AFP, the note was found on an American Airlines flight that would depart from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, Georgia to DFW International Airport, Texas. According to WRCBTV.com, the note was found on the plane at around 7:00 local time. As a result, the aircraft failed to prepare for takeoff and passengers were asked to disembark ahead of the fuselage to be rechecked at the gate. In addition, it was also mentioned that the threat record found on the plane helped make the FAA stop the flight that would land at Hartsfield-Jackson airport in an effort to anticipate. Fox23.com added, Carlos Campos as a spokesman for the Atlanta police said that it also immediately conducted a thorough inspection on the aircraft for potential threats to safety and security. After the investigation, no indication was found that the threat record was credible. In the end the American Airlines Flight 2770 was also given a take-off license, with the new airport operation running normally again around 11am local time.
